short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix broken tile images on BGA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension fixes the bug of broken images of tiles displayed in the logs in the game of Carcassonne on the website Board Game Arena. Currently, it only runs in the game replay page.
